title: copyboteth
author: copyboteth
content: Hi Bitcoin talk community!We are launching a new Telegram bot that gamifies and simplifies copytrading on the Ethereum Mainnet.Below is a short description of our platform. We are looking for paid social media moderators, but are also open for anyone with unique skills to join the team.Shortly after the launch of our platform, there will be a ERC-20 token too.Check it out below! Any tips / suggestions are always welcome!+++Copybot is a new crypto project that lets users easily copytrade elite traders or show off your investing skills by joining our leaderboards. Holders of our tokens can copytrade any trader using our easy-to-use Telegram bot. Profitable traders can link their wallet to the leaderboards and get a proportion of generated taxes in proportion to the amount of copytraders that follow their trades. Start earning money by copytrading the best investors in DeFi or amass a following and share in our success!+++Website: www.copyboteth.comTwitter: twitter.com/copybotethLimited time Telegram discussion link: https://x.com/copyboteth/status/1705678724002165161?s=20
